Description.Text:
Position The Junior Hotel is located in the heart of Marina Centro of Rimini, close to the historical city center and at only 250 meters from the beach.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last refurbishment: 2006.
Breakfast: Sweet and salty buffet. During meals: choice between 2 menus, mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
The all inclusive treatments includes: beverages during meals such as 1/4 l. wine + 1/2 l. of mineral water per person per meal + beach services with 1 sun umbrella and 2 sun beds per room (for DUS rooms only 1 sun umbrella + 1 sun bed).
Credit cards accepted: Eurocard / Mastercard, American Express and Visa.
Check in from 02:00 pm. Check out within 10:00 am
